body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
When creating schema and db (in my case pgsql) sql-tool fails when database or schema already exists. That prevents from running the tool multple times to ensure the schema (idempotency). It would be nice to be able to ignore those errors.

reference (I am doing something similar but outside the autosetup)
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/docker/start.sh#L77

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
title: sql-tool should be able to ignore "already exists" errors
